title: Did Muslim Groups Keep Money Intended for Victims of the Pittsburgh Synagogue Shooting?
subtitle: Conservative web sites grossly misrepresented the facts surrounding the transfer of $238,634 in funds raised by two Muslim charities.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Muslim organizations or a mosque kept most of the $238,634 raised for the victims of an October 2018 mass shooting at the Tree of Life synagogue in Pittsburgh.
